attributes.action: Make it legal for females to carry mace in order to prevent violent attacks
attributes.additional_details:
In order to preserve the safety and self independence of women throughout our lands
To reduce the threat of predatory attacks against women
To inspire a better, safer, equal and valuable community within our land
To stand for women's rights as you so claim to be.
To make our cities and towns safer for women no matter the time of day
To make women's lives safer and valued in society
attributes.background: To dismiss the law which considers carrying mace the same criminal offence as carrying a gun thus diminishing the safety of vulnerable women in our society
